docs.summary: A text element on a mobile app.
description: + This API is only relevant for custom widgets in [Branded Apps](https://www.wix.com/app-builder).
+ Custom widgets are not yet available to all users.
+ This API is in [Developer Preview](https://www.wix.com/velo/reference/api-overview/developer-preview) and is subject to change.
A [text](https://support.wix.com/en/article/wix-editor-adding-and-editing-text) element on a mobile app.

docs.summary: Sets or gets the plain-text contents of a text element.
description: >**Note:** This mobile `text` property only supports plain text and not HTML tags.
Setting the `text` property sets the plain-text contents of
the text element. Any text that the element already contained is
replaced. The new text is formatted using the formatting that was used
on of the first character of the previous `text` value.
Getting the `text` property returns the plain-text content

examples.title: Get a text element's plain-text content
Set a text element's plain-text content
